verses.verse: Remember <WH2142> <WH8798> now thy Creator <WH1254> <WH8802> in the days <WH3117> of thy youth <WH979>, while the evil <WH7451> days <WH3117> come <WH935> <WH8799> not, nor the years <WH8141> draw nigh <WH5060> <WH8689>, when thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8799>, I have no pleasure <WH2656> in them;

While the sun <WH8121>, or the light <WH216>, or the moon <WH3394>, or the stars <WH3556>, be not darkened <WH2821> <WH8799>, nor the clouds <WH5645> return <WH7725> <WH8804> after <WH310> the rain <WH1653>:

In the day <WH3117> when the keepers <WH8104> <WH8802> of the house <WH1004> shall tremble <WH2111> <WH8799>, and the strong <WH2428> men <WH582> shall bow <WH5791> <WH8694> themselves, and the grinders <WH2912> <WH8802> cease <WH988> <WH8804> because they are few <WH4591> <WH8765>, and those that look out <WH7200> <WH8802> of the windows <WH699> be darkened <WH2821> <WH8804>,

And the doors <WH1817> shall be shut <WH5462> <WH8795> in the streets <WH7784>, when the sound <WH6963> of the grinding <WH2913> is low <WH8217>, and he shall rise up <WH6965> <WH8799> at the voice <WH6963> of the bird <WH6833>, and all the daughters <WH1323> of musick <WH7892> shall be brought low <WH7817> <WH8735>;

Also when they shall be afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of that which is high <WH1364>, and fears <WH2849> shall be in the way <WH1870>, and the almond tree <WH8247> shall flourish <WH5006> <WH8686>, and the grasshopper <WH2284> shall be a burden <WH5445> <WH8691>, and desire <WH35> shall fail <WH6565> <WH8686>: because man <WH120> goeth <WH1980> <WH8802> to his long <WH5769> home <WH1004>, and the mourners <WH5594> <WH8802> go about <WH5437> <WH8804> the streets <WH7784>:

Or ever <WH3808> the silver <WH3701> cord <WH2256> be loosed <WH7576> <WH8735> <WH8675> <WH7368> <WH8735>, or the golden <WH2091> bowl <WH1543> be broken <WH7533> <WH8799>, or the pitcher <WH3537> be broken <WH7665> <WH8735> at the fountain <WH4002>, or the wheel <WH1534> broken <WH7533> <WH8738> at the cistern <WH953>.
Then shall the dust <WH6083> return <WH7725> <WH8799> to the earth <WH776> as it was: and the spirit <WH7307> shall return <WH7725> <WH8799> unto 'Elohim <WH430> who gave <WH5414> <WH8804> it.
Vanity <WH1892> of vanities <WH1892>, saith <WH559> <WH8804> the preacher <WH6953>; all is vanity <WH1892>.

And moreover <WH3148>, because the preacher <WH6953> was wise <WH2450>, he still taught <WH3925> <WH8765> the people <WH5971> knowledge <WH1847>; yea, he gave good heed <WH239> <WH8765>, and sought out <WH2713> <WH8765>, and set in order <WH8626> <WH8765> many <WH7235> <WH8687> proverbs <WH4912>.

The preacher <WH6953> sought <WH1245> <WH8765> to find out <WH4672> <WH8800> acceptable <WH2656> words <WH1697>: and that which was written <WH3789> <WH8803> was upright <WH3476>, even words <WH1697> of truth <WH571>.

The words <WH1697> of the wise <WH2450> are as goads <WH1861>, and as nails <WH4930> fastened <WH5193> <WH8803> by the masters <WH1167> of assemblies <WH627>, which are given <WH5414> <WH8738> from one <WH259> shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802>.

And further <WH3148>, by these <WH1992>, my son <WH1121>, be admonished <WH2094> <WH8734>: of making <WH6213> <WH8800> many <WH7235> <WH8687> books <WH5612> there is no end <WH7093>; and much <WH7235> <WH8687> study <WH3854> is a weariness <WH3024> of the flesh <WH1320>.

Let us hear <WH8085> <WH8799> the conclusion <WH5490> of the whole matter <WH1697>: Fear <WH3372> <WH8798> 'Elohim <WH430>, and keep <WH8104> <WH8798> his Mitzvot <WH4687>: for this is the whole duty of man <WH120>.
For 'Elohim <WH430> shall bring <WH935> <WH8686> every work <WH4639> into judgment <WH4941>, with every secret thing <WH5956> <WH8737>, whether it be good <WH2896>, or whether it be evil <WH7451>.
